name: Where Wolf
slogan: Making in-store inventories searchable and shoppable for nearby digital shoppers
description:
Shoppers don’t want to wander aimlessly for hours, around the high streets anymore. We agree they shouldn’t have to! We want to show you the high street like you’ve never seen it before. Reconnect you with it. Make it the place you look first for the things you want. We want to bring the thrill of the chase to every shopping mission; to inspire you to shop smarter; on your terms and at your convenience.
 
If you want to be part of the next Fashion Revolution! Join Where Wolf!

jobs.title: Marketing and Event internship
jobs.description:
Key Responsibilities Include:
Upcoming 6 months we are organizing a series of Pop-ups throughout London. We want to take our online platform offline and show shoppers how the platform can be used as a digital shopping assistant. Last August we kicked off our London series of pop-ups at Slingsby Place Covent Garden. This Where Wolf pop-up has been covered by numerous international media such as Drapers, Fashion United, and The Industry among others.

For the upcoming 6 months we are looking for an intern who can help us with the Marketing and Sales for the organization of the pop-ups 

Marketing:
Managing the social media presence and scheduling posts
Creating content in line with the digital media plan
Grow social media presence and following
Collaborating with the Tech Team located in India
Website Maintenance
Reporting & Analysis of results
Roll-out of on-ground marketing plans

Events:
Help with the organization of the pop-up
Organization of the in-store events
Create event communication and responsible for roll-out
Collaborate with social media team on event communication 
Oversee all operations for the pop-up
Make scripts for each event


The Person:
Passionate about Marketing and Events
Organising is your A-Game
Able to work seriously and with a big autonomy
Reliable entrepreneurial self-starter who feels comfortable accepting the challenge and responsibility of this important role.
Pro-active with a ‘can-do’ attitude
Willing to learn fast
Fashion and Shopping makes your world go around


Location: Central London, W1

Starting date: Asap

Salary: Depends on experience
